message: Hey Olivier! That fire emoji got me curious 😄 What's the hottest thing happening your way?
Hey Kaila, you’re just gorgeous, see pictures of you let me dream what it would be to have a beautiful wife like you… with respect of course : I like the way you’re 😊
Aw that's really sweet of you Olivier! I'm just enjoying village life here in Bali between studies. What kind of dreams are you having these days?

It should be cool to live there , I am getting more and more curious about you, What types of studies are you doing? My dreams : find a woman with whom sharing intimate moments together, to be loved, loving someone, talking together, to go in vacation, when I go to work everyday getting news from my soulmate…, so many dreams Me I live in Tahiti, spending my last 4 days in USA finishing my vacation then go back to Tahiti: busy life! It would be great to have more time in life spending with people we love…
Accounting studies keep me busy between village projects here! Tahiti sounds amazing though 😊 What's your favorite part about living there?

The nature : the sea, plants (like gardening, having the opportunity to visit islands like Bora Bora I like painting… when I have time : Days are too short 😌 and what about you ? And if it’s not to personal are you still single A young woman like you should have many contenders

Tahiti's nature sounds dreamy Olivier! Painting and island hopping must be incredible ❤️ And yeah I'm single, studies and the social village project keeps me busy. What's your favorite painting you've done recently?

Inspired by the past, pictures, some from my grand parents essentially, but the last one, from a post card, is a blue truck on the way to my village Papenoo, where we can see on one side the ocean, my favorite for now, but it depends of my feelings of the moment sometimes I prefer another one : a big one a big house of an ancestor with him and his wife carrying his son, on the deck & what think the others, Do you think we can find love nowadays Do you believe someone will succeed to conquer your heart to love someone from another country is possible ❤️? How can you describe yourself if you don’t mind?

That blue truck painting sounds so meaningful Olivier ❤️ I love how your art connects to personal memories. About love across borders, I believe real connections can happen anywhere, though my village project keeps me pretty grounded in Bali for now! I would say I am a regular girl, trying to navigate this sometimes crazy plane of existence hehe. How you described yourself?

Thanks! The life has made myself be what I am today : a young Happy guy growing in a beautiful island getting older & wiser, and growing, encountering many people, traveling/visiting many countries … though: a honest man, nice, responsible, with heartfelt heart, his own character… 🙃wanting to enjoy a new life, greeting moments with a nice wife… What is the way to meet someone in life like you ? To interest you? Would you like to know many friends before having one day only the one man to get to know to live with?

You sound like someone who's living a full life Olivier 😊 Meeting someone special happens naturally when you least expect it, for me, it's about that instant connection that makes you want to know more. Would you say you believe in love at first sight or does it take time for you?

Yes, you’re right, Love is for me a question of feeling it could be at first sight as there are conditions make you feel like you’re in front the one as regard her beauty, there’s also the attraction between two persons, but in another hand you get more more interested by someone that you’re getting to know, seeing her, with whom talking to, so it’s in general the time spent with someone that is important too, it takes time though I would tell 🙂Kaila is a beautiful name, you look young and smart I wish I could spend time with you in real one day So tell me about you about the conception of love, if you’re are romantic? What kind of relationship would you like to have?
